website_summaries.verdict: Though its top selling point is the affordable price, it's also well made and practical for a variety of uses and hair types. Detangles without pulling, can be used on dry or wet hair.
pros: Made by a company recognized for making quality hair-care products, the Conair has rounded nylon bristles, soft ridged handle, and middle-of-the-road size that's ideal for everyday use and travel
cons: Bristles are slightly stiff, and a few may occasionally fall out
You don't get to choose the color you get

customer_reviews.title: It brushes hair
customer_reviews.text: It's a hair brush and it brushes hair. Not much else to say. I paid for it and it arrived. It keeps my child from looking like an orphan when she goes to school.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: It got broken after 3 weeks!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 WEEKS i was using it and broke inside my hair and my hair is not even that thick!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first week
customer_reviews.text: This was actually the first time a brush has ever broken on me while I was brushing my hair it has a very light plastic membrane that slipped out of place when you’re brushing your hair almost like they didn’t finish gluing it on or didn’t use enough glue either way it broke while I was using it the first week
customer_reviews.author: Near

customer_reviews.title: Best brush made!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a replacement brush that I bought 25 years ago. The old brush worked great and now a little of the paint is wearing off. I was so happy to see that Amazon had a brush almost 100% like my old one. My hair is somewhat thick and brushes tend to get hung up in my hair. This one doesn't. It glides through like a knife through butter. Thanks for still producing one of the best brushes I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: Great little round brush for blow-drying.
customer_reviews.text: Great little round brush for blow-drying. You have to know how to use a round brush, though, so that it doesn't tangle in your hair. Just don't wrap your hair all the way around; instead, pull the brush straight up to the end of the hair, then turn it a bit, but make sure the hair doesn't fully wrap around the barrel. The only thing I'd change about this brush is that it needs about another 1/2" in length to the handle end. The bristle end is fine.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Colors May Vary
customer_reviews.text: No Kidding "Colors May Vary", you think you will receive a blue hair brush (as shown) and you receive pink which is the last color I would want. This is why buying at a store and not online is a good idea. You take your chances buying online and sometimes you are disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, effective drying on my very short hair!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good, easy to hold, gentle tips round brush for my very short hair for a long time! This is it! I love it. Does the job without pulling out my hair or hurting my scalp. I highly recommendit!
customer_reviews.author: JerseyPat

customer_reviews.title: Will Change your life!
customer_reviews.text: Not really...I just could not think of a title. It does the job. It’s a hairbrush...there isn’t much one can say other than it’s not an expensive pedigree brush with fancy bristles. It’s fine if you have short or medium length hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Cracks
customer_reviews.text: Well at first few months it's good, then eventually it breaks out, or releases those cracks. If ur one of those people who uses blow dryer on hot air mode this isn't the right brush for u. These brush are no good on the long run. U might have to buy one after another. It's stays good for about 5-months.
customer_reviews.author: SHOAIB SHARIF

customer_reviews.title: A small but efficient brush.
customer_reviews.text: I needed another brush. I've had Conair brushes before so know that they are usually very nice. This one is no different...just what I was looking for in a second brush. It's smaller but does an excellent job brushing my short wavy hair, and the handle fits comfortably in my hand. The nylon bristles are very good at massaging my scalp and holding on to the hairs that are ready to leave my head. It's also easy to clean. I couldn't have asked for a better brush!
customer_reviews.author: EdE

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at the measurements before when replacing an older brush. Wife wanted a round one, nylon bristle and this was the lowest cost. After many years of owning her's and packing it on trips, it's cracking and worn. She was worried this wouldn't work but she tried it works as well as her old one when blow drying. Small will be bonus when packing it on trips now. Hope this one lasts just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I bought, only three bucks? Great value. It has little round blue balls at the end of every bristle, that make for a smooth brush, but they soon started coming off. Soon my shower was littered with blue balls. The bristles are sharp on the end and will scratch your head. Amazon, please do not hilight a product of such poor quality. Your credibility has been diminished by a cheap little brush.
customer_reviews.author: jagadeesan

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairbrush, New Color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my "old reliable" ConAir blow drying hairbrush that I have had since the beginning of all time. I really have had my older version since my children were small. I had to get a second one so I can keep one on my dresser and one next to the sink and mirror in the bathroom. Now if the boyfriend "accidentally steals" one, I won't hunt him down with my #8 cast iron skillet and take it back. haha. This one is vibrant turquoise blue and black. Thanks for making this available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Snow

customer_reviews.title: Two stars for the price
customer_reviews.text: Recently got my hair cut short and was looking for a comb to the job. Came across this one as it was affordable and seemed durable. This comes in a decent plastic covering and the bristles somewhat do the job. Does not work on my curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ritik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush for long haired dogs, my guy loves it, and it saves me money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a trial run for my long-haired dog. Most dog brushes have thinner bristles and not very well 'padded' on the bristle ends. This brush looked like it was going to be very comfortable, and it is! My dog loves getting brushed with this one, as it doesn't hurt him. I also saved a lot of money over the dog brushes I had been buying, which are now in the trash. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Woul like to choose my color of brush.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush; I have fine hair works very well and is easy on your scalp. I have small hands and this brush fits well in my hand .Brush is easy to clean. Just wish we could choose the color we want. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: This breaks or cracks easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought it last month, used it about three times and it broke. I have natural hair but I used it on blow dried hair,meaning my hair wasn't very tangled. And other times only after I used a comb.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Today's best all about the Gr8 deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I am looking for. I don't like the other types of brushes with the cousin at the base of the brush. I could use this in the shower to brush the shampoo through my hair (my hair is at the center of my back) I use this for my beard as well I was also was looking for one for that purpose as well. If I use a comb it pulls my hair out and I have lost too much hair. So I will be ordering others of this product. Thanks Amazon I appreciate your service and products. Rodolfo Martinez Jr
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Martinez Jr

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to hairbrush. Well, actually my only hairbrush. I had the same model for at least ten years. My wife used my old hairbrush to brush the dog and put it in the washer which pretty much destroyed it. Recommend do not wash them in the washer. I bought the same model to replace the old one and am happy once gain.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzit

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no static!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very sturdy and withstands my wire-thick hair tangles. It also doesn't cause static and that's the selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for ethnic curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have curly “ethnic” hair and this brush works so well! No other brush can painlessly detangle my hair. This is the only brush that doesn’t pull and tug and break my hair when I detangle it while it’s wet and while it’s dry. I use it to brush through my hair after applying conditioner, and my curls become defined and absolutely perfect. This is the only detangling brush that I’ll use now so I bought three of them!
customer_reviews.author: Cataleya

customer_reviews.title: Brush
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush it’s very travel savvy small compact dries my hair just fine. I use it for my bangs I say it it can work on hair that isn’t as thin like mines also I don’t know how to style my hair so I couldn’t tell you if will fix better. But it works fine for me I don’t expect a lot since I’m not a stylist also my hair is kind of retarded when it comes to styling so I can just say is fine 😊
customer_reviews.author: vanessa gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for short hair only
customer_reviews.text: The brush works really well, but is definitely for short hair only. Like everyone else right now, I haven't been able to get a haircut and even a little too long hair gets wrapped around the bristles. And let me tell you, it hurts working that brush back out! For the low price, it's fine with a little care.
customer_reviews.author: Ccolor

customer_reviews.title: Hair it Comes
customer_reviews.text: This Conair Hair Brush gives you great functionality at a bargain price. My hair is short, so I don't have great needs from a bush, other than taming it a little bit. This brush does just what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: A. Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Works great, static notwithstanding
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no snagging even with long and thick unruly mess of hair. It's solid through the middle so not perfect for use with a hair dryer, but it gets the job done. It does build up some static electricity through prolonged use (leaves hair a little frizzy), but that's not unexpected with a plastic/nylon brush
customer_reviews.author: E. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great little hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a small but strong hairbrush, and this is perfect - comfortable, and inexpensive too. It arrived quickly and works as expected. So far it seems sturdy enough for my longish, mostly straight hair, and it gets the tangles out, wet or dry. I expect to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Maryland

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: So not really sure how to write a review for a hair brush as I am a guy and not really my expertise, however I use this one as it does what I need it to which is help get my hair setup before putting my hair gel in, I do a part style. Replacing the one I have has it a few years old now.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Luxury. When you have hair as long as mine, and a lot of it, you need a brush that will brush through all the layers. These bristles are long and comb through my hair. It also makes for a great scalp massage. A definitely buy if you have straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: nvs

customer_reviews.title: Hairs get stuck in the handle!
customer_reviews.text: There is a small gap in the handle just above the colored band and I have had a few hairs get stuck and pulled out due to it. I guess you get what you pay for the overall quality of this brush is very low.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: Can be rough with your hair and tear off strands
customer_reviews.text: A handy little brush. My only issue with this product is that some of the bristles broke off and yanked my hair when I first used it. I've definitely owned hair brushes before so I don't think it's the fault of my usage. It's been working fine since, but I'm still wary.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and then some
customer_reviews.text: These brushes actually don’t break or fall apart after a few uses. I’m so tired of buying cheap brushes that break! They are super durable and easy to clean/pull hear off of. I got my daughter one and myself one, absolutely no complaints. If i ever need to replace i most likely will buy them again. Can’t beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: alextiff_

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Really decent brushes (I purchased 2). Good grip, ends are rounded, so easy on my scalp. I have long hair and the brush goes easily through and takes out any tangles with no problem. I'm thinking of purchasing a couple more at this price just for back-up.
customer_reviews.author: LongTimeAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: I got a pink one on the picture it showed a blue one I was expecting the blue
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Not really much to say about a brush, it serves its purpose and it was a great price. I ordered blue however I got a purple one in the mail. I’m not letting it affect my product review though because it doesn’t really matter and, it does say “colors may vary” in the description. Good brush overall no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: RIGHT SIZE-LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED THE SIZE, I HAVE HAD ANOTHER OF THE SAME STYLE AND BRAND FOR MORE THAN 10YRS AND THIS WAS A REPLACEMENT, I'M HAPPY WITH THE OVERALL QUALITY AND DESIGN, MY ONE BONE TO PICK IS NOT KNOWING HOW TO CLEAN THE BRUSH FROM FUZZ AND DANDER INSIDE THE BARREL...?
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: no pig here
customer_reviews.text: I bought it simple because I do not want to brush my head or face with board hair. yeah I said it. That's gross. So I looked for brushes that were made without and I came across this here. It's soft, comfortable easy to hold and light.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Newson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, crappy brush, not worth any money
customer_reviews.text: falling apart - my husband has very curly hair and the protective balls are being pulled off and leaving scratchy ends. update - evil hard bristles that will hurt your scalp - don't waste your money on crap.
customer_reviews.author: rural girl

customer_reviews.title: It's a good brush!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good brush...very basic...lightweight...perfect size for my small hands and my dense hair. I have a bob and it works perfectly for fluffing and back combing the crown...soooo, it's a good brush and the price is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam and Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old so she could have her own brush. It's done very well holding up so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra B

customer_reviews.title: Great brush (Male with short-medium length hair)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brush! Only thing that I can't get over is that they shipped me a pink brush instead of a blue one like in the picture. This is negligible for most people, as it doesn't affect the great usability of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Finally Found This
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the one I use to have and love in high school in the 80s. I have looked for years for one like it, finally found. Very durable and glides easily through my short hair. Love it
customer_reviews.author: C McC - Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Shipping nightmare, but AMAZING product!
customer_reviews.text: Many of the Amazon pages do not tell you where the product is shipping from - Amazon's fault. Unfortunately, this shipped from China (I ordered it in Feb 2020). My order became stuck on a shipping dock for almost 6 months. After protesting about a refund, in late-July, this finally arrived. The brush/dryer is fantastic and makes my hair look like I just left the salon. As long as you can get past shipping nightmares, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Reardon

customer_reviews.title: For women's hair.
customer_reviews.text: Why couldn't they just tell me this was a woman's hair brush? This is 3x as big as my other brush. I must have read the "colors may vary", but I didn't realize that meant I couldn't choose my color. It's ok, they random color they got me is good too. The price is good and I can give this away to a woman.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: xs round brush
customer_reviews.text: perfect brush to curl/style your short/medium hair while blow drying it. no need for curling iron afterwards if you use mouse too! not sure why it says boar bristle for this round brush for there is no boar bristles whatsoever in it.
customer_reviews.author: Casper & BooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and very hard - do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you get what you pay for - this is one of those times. This is just a very cheap, hard brush. I'll be returning it. Save your money and buy the curved boar bristle vent brush set by Ineffable Care - they're soft and soothing on the scalp, easy to get through your hair, and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: it worked
customer_reviews.text: I just cut my hair short and needed help with styling, this worked just fine and was easy to use and hold with the blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: ehfar526

customer_reviews.title: It brushed my hair
customer_reviews.text: I used this to brush my hair. I was successful.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: very good brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush that i loan it to my mom and she loved it as well so i had to order her one to have . i love when the i can fell the brush go threw my hair and give me a good scratch . it don't tear out my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Safe for brittle hair !
customer_reviews.text: They are my first choice brand of brushes. My hair has become very brittle in hard water, and these brushes are gentle on my hair. Durable plastic, great price and a variety of brushes for every hair need.
customer_reviews.author: Kavita Shah

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 1 for me and 1 for my dog Briscoe. This brush is awesome for his hair ( Lhasa Apso ) which is very fine. I have spent big bucks for Doggy brushes and none of them do the job like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Fine.... For A While
customer_reviews.text: This brush worked great for about a year, then the brush head broke off the handle. So sad but also so predictable. The brush that I replaced with this I had owned for going on 20 years. *shrug*
customer_reviews.author: Greg K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality in a perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush. It is perfect for my purse and when I travel. Same quality as the larger one I use at home in a portable size.
customer_reviews.author: shannon friedman

customer_reviews.title: Pulls hair.
customer_reviews.text: Pulls my hair. The brush is hard and the bristles are not gentle. It pulls my hair as I brush it. I am going to have to buy a new brush. Going to go back to the soft round one with rubber part that holds the softer bristles. Will keep this in an emergency or maybe in my travel kit. I am not throwing it away so it's only a 2 star from me.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for years without losing those little blue tips
customer_reviews.text: Always a winner. My favorite brush. I just bought this one to replace my old one that I'd had for about five years. The best thing about this brush is that the little blue tips don't come off! What eventually retired my last one was the separation of the handle from the head. But it lasted a LONG time before that happened.
customer_reviews.author: K. A.

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had a Conair brush for a long time, it was good but got too old. I got this brush and I like it quite a bit. It's easy to hold, light, and comfortable. I think it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Tolui

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap brush.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these to use on my dog. We brush him every time he goes in and out of the house and he doesn't mind these brushes. Anything with tighter bristles might pull out too much of his hair and these are spaced out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: I have three others and just bought an extra, I keep them at home, work and in my car. I love the weight and feel of this brush. It is easy to use when blow drying my hair. I also love the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Ginatx

customer_reviews.title: It’s not bad...
customer_reviews.text: I like that its small and you can travel with it but I dislike how long the bristles are and how big and round the balls on the end are. I don’t feel like it’s a smooth relaxing experience and fully accomplished what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Brand
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I bought this was... My original was over 5 years old and ready to see another side of society. Why this brand? Trust. I see many salons use this brand. If it's good for them its good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Liebler

customer_reviews.title: Good for Travel but Quality is Meh
customer_reviews.text: While it should work just fine to brush your hair, I found that trying to detangle my hair with this meant destroying the brush. The individual brush teeth are mostly attached to the brush by pressure and not any adhesive. While I was out traveling for around 3 weeks, my brush lost around 25 teeth. It still works, but it'd definitely not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: It gets a lot of dust and lint out of my hair and doesnt hurt on the occasion i run into a tangle. It untangles my hair quickly and painlessly even after a 4 day depression induced no brushing binge. This brush is great! I will definitely be buying again when its time!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. Easy on the scalp, doesn't pull my hair out, & easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J. Bacus

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend because his old one was really worn out. He likes the size, how easy it is to use and how it doesn't scratch his head. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: This hair brush is perfect for traveling. I keep it in my gym bag and it's perfect for fixing your hair after a workout. It's comfortable to hold and is durable. It's small enough to fix in most places.
customer_reviews.author: @Pancakes&Cookies

customer_reviews.title: My favorite one so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used so many combs in my life so far and this is my most favorite so far. It feels comfortable to hold on and also the bristles feel so soft. I've thick hair and the comb slides through comfortably. Very good buy for the price when I bought this on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Arun D.

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good Quality as the Original Conair Purse Brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my old Conair purse size brush finally fell apart after MANY YEARS (at least 10). I am very disappointed in this version as it is clearly not made with the same quality. The first time I used it, one of the pins/bristles fell off. They have continued to fall off. I was able to super glue my old brush back together and that is what I use and this became my gym/pool/beach brush. I use my old one as my main brush as it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice brush!
customer_reviews.text: My old hair brush had lost a lot of bristles - this was a wonderful replacement. Arrived quickly, and has a good feel when brushing!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Try this brush and you won’t buy another!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush so much I’m going to order more. It’s easy to clean, lightweight and easy to hold and use. It’s high quality and the best airbrush I’ve used. You won’t be disappointed. And at such a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Slater-Price

customer_reviews.title: A++ brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush! I was able to get all the knots out of my daughter's hair in less than 10 minutes and no tears. I would highly recommend this brush to anyone who struggles with knots & tangles. Great for tender heads.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice one
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through several of these kind of brushes... this is very nice so far. been using it for few months now. ended up getting one each for everyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Waiting Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush does not work with my fine bob hairstyle. Pulls it straight rather than curving under.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: The tips have started falling off the bristles and does not look appealing anymore. Also the bristles are not so gentle to comb.
customer_reviews.author: spb

customer_reviews.title: Colors may vary
customer_reviews.text: Colors may vary....I missed that. Thought I was getting a blue brush. It is pink. My wife teased my a bit, but it is a good brush. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dougt

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Brush, Bristles slightly damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival the packaging had damaged the bristles of the brush, as there are already some bristles that are bent, twisted, and just not in good condition. Besides that, it is affordable and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Baumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for $3.88!
customer_reviews.text: Truth be told I always go for the bargain. $3.88 for this great hairbrush. Quality? A-1! Thanks, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shizue Leigh Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brush. It’s sturdy and has a comfortable grip. I dry my wavy hair straighter and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: it decided to break randomly!
customer_reviews.text: I had it in my medicine cabinet and found a huge crack in the middle of it ... when it had not been dropped or anything! but I tried to use it anyway and it completely broke into 3 pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dense "bristles", easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This brush is sturdy, easy to clean, and has a dense "bristle" count, which makes it easy to dry and control the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little brush! I let my hair air dry most days, so I keep this in my purse to brush through it every now and then. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. Bristles are very close together. Would be better with a little more space between to allow additional air flow
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The brush is nice and I ordered a second blue one. Problem is the second one I got was pink. If you don't care what color you get buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The best Brush you will ever buy
customer_reviews.text: The best brush I ever owned in my life. I don't think I'll ever find another brush that works as good at brushing out the knots and just all in all a perfect brush
customer_reviews.author: Wood8479

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's a brush. It brushes. I like the plastic so I can use in the shower after I use conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and this now lives in my overnight bag. It's the perfect size for traveling! It works well on my hair (medium-long and mostly straight), doesn't cause problems with static, and doesn't seem to cause breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Super Hair Brush
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these brushes and the work great. Cost was really good and they are a very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peachee Keene

customer_reviews.title: Great for stubborn knots
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 girls, with long hair. Knots happen. We use the easy wet dry brushes, but when a stubborn knot appears, this seems to be the best at getting those out. We have about 5 around the house. Great brush!
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Needed a Brush and this one was Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great brush... With Covid-19 and being in a State that does not allow haircuts my hair has grown out a great bit the last 3 months.... Needed a few brushes and ordered this one, really like it for when I get out of the shower and want to dry off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent brush, not super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy who bought this brush to do some light styling. I've used similar brushes with softer bristles that made for a more pleasurable experience (nearly a head massage!). These bristles are shorter and thicker, but they still get the job done. Not regretting the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke with in a week of having it, very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for traveling
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my mom, she likes it for a travel brush, wish there was a bigger one for her home use as well
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: I finally had to replace my brush and ordered this one, I am glad I did. It does not break the ends of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are nice, not weak.
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfortable in your hand, bristles are not weak, nor do they gouge your scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a person to take a lot of time styling my hair. I love this brush. It’s easy to use !
customer_reviews.author: Terry S. Wenhold

customer_reviews.title: conair all purpose brush
customer_reviews.text: good quality brush but some of the bristles are bent perhaps do to shipping in a envelope
customer_reviews.author: B. Minges

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel or every day
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair, so the boar-bristle brushes don't work for me. This inexpensive brush holds my hair while I blow it dry, and is small and compact for traveling. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AC Too

customer_reviews.title: One Brush It's Simple
customer_reviews.text: Best brush on the planet! This brush is amazing. You will loose this brush before it breaks or falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom!

customer_reviews.title: Great all around brush
customer_reviews.text: Great hairbrush. Easy on hair strands. Easy to use when blow drying to style hair.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My wife used it to make curls on her hair along with the hair dryer and her hair got all messed up and caught on this comb
customer_reviews.author: Hamza_89

customer_reviews.title: As Expected!
customer_reviews.text: What I expect from a brush. Quality is nice and comfortable hand grip. The bristles were firm enough to break through my knotted hair, but flexible enough to make it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Desiano

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it
customer_reviews.text: Looked a long time for 1 inch round brush and here it is!!!! Good price and fits in my purse easily
customer_reviews.author: Dzotte

product_meta.title: Conair Pro Hair Brush with Nylon Bristle, All-Purpose, Colors May Vary
product_meta.description: Style:All-Purpose BrushConair - Pro hair brush with nylon bristle all-purpose, ideal for brushing out roller set hair, ball tipped bristles will not snag or pull soft ridged grip for comfortable hold with control use for everyday brushing and styling for all hair lengths and textures
feature_bullets: ALL-PURPOSE HAIR BRUSH: This mid-size brush is a multitasker! Brush out a roller set, add volume & lift to any style, or just do everyday brushing. The ball-tipped bristles won’t snag or pull hair.

FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: Whether you are looking for a detangling wet brush, round, vented, paddle, or heated brushes for blow-drying & styling or a mini brush to throw in your purse, Conair has you covered!

HIGH QUALITY HAIR ACCESSORIES: From classic scrunchies & no-damage hair elastics to glam bobby pins, curlers, rollers, hair wraps, clips, & brushes Conair has the accessories & styling tools you need.

INNOVATIVE HAIR CARE TOOLS: From blow dryers to auto-curlers, combo stylers, & specialty hair brushes—whatever your hair type or length, Conair has a styler that will let you create any look you feel like wearing!
CONAIR HAIR CARE: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, & more. Our hair care line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, & hair accessories.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
